src_original: ādikarmiṇāṃ mahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ vāṣṭau mūlāpattayo /  yābhir mūlāpattibhiḥ skhalitā ādikarmikā mahāyānasaṃprasthitāḥ sarvāṇi pūrvāvaropitāni kuśalamūlāni jhāṣayanti /  vastupatitāḥ parājitā devamanuṣyamahāyānamukhād apāyagāmino bhavanti ciraṃ ca saṃsāre sīdanti kalyāṇamitravirahitāḥ /
tgt_original: 初發心菩薩趣向大乘，有八根本罪犯波羅夷，先所修習一切善根皆悉燒然，墮於惡趣離安隱處失人天樂，亦失大乘境界之樂，久在生死離善知識。

src_original: katamā aṣṭau /

src_original: ye satvāḥ pūrvaduścaritahetunāsmin kliṣṭe pañcakaṣāye loke upapannās tae itvarakuśalamūlāḥ kalyāṇamitraṃ saṃniḥśrityedaṃ paramaṃ gambhīraṃ mahāyānaṃ śṛṇvanti /  te ca parīttabuddhayo 'pi kulaputrā annuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādayanti /
tgt_original: 謂彼菩薩宿業因緣生五濁世，有餘善根近善知識，歸趣甚深大乘之法，發無上心智慧微淺。

src_original: teṣāṃ ādikarmikā ye ca bodhisatvā idaṃ paramagambhīraṃ śūnyatāpratisaṃyuktaṃ sūtrāntaṃ śṛṇvanti uddiśanti paṭhanti /  te yathāśrutaṃ yathāparyavāptaṃ pareṣāṃ pūrvabuddhisadṛśānāṃ svarthaṃ suvyañjanaṃ vistareṇāgrataḥ smārayanti prakāśayanti /  te hy akṛtaśamā bālāḥ pṛthagjanāḥ śṛṇvanta uttrasyanti saṃtrasyanti saṃtrāsam āpadyante /
tgt_original: 是初發心菩薩，又從他聞甚深空法讀誦受持，復於少智愚癡人前讀誦解說，餘人聞已驚疑怖畏，於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心生退沒樂聲聞乘，是名初發心菩薩犯於第一根本重罪，先所修習一切善根皆悉燒然，墮於惡趣離安隱處，失人天樂及以大乘境界之樂，壞菩提心。 是故菩薩，宜應先知眾生善根及了彼心，隨其所堪次第說法，如入大海漸漸至深。 善男子！ 是虛空藏菩薩摩訶薩，隨其所應以種種形現生其土而為說法，令生慚愧，於所犯罪發露懺悔，不墮惡趣增進善根，長養阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心。 善男子！

src_original: punar aparam ādikarmiko bodhisatvaḥ kasyacid eva vakṣyati //
tgt_original: 「復次善男子！ 初發心菩薩語餘人言：

src_original: na tvaṃ śakyasi ṣaṭpāramitāsu caryāṃ cartuṃ /  na tvaṃ śakyasy annuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhuṃ /
tgt_original: 『汝今不能樂於大乘，亦不能行六波羅蜜，終不能得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。

src_original: śīghraṃ tvaṃ śrāvakayāne pratyekabuddhayāne vā cittam utpādaya /  tena tvaṃ saṃsārān niryāsyasi /
tgt_original: 不如早發聲聞辟支佛心，速盡生死入般涅槃。

src_original: yāvad yathāpūrvoktam iyam ādikarmikasya bodhisatvasya dvidyā mūlāpattiḥ //
tgt_original: 』餘如上說。 是名初發心菩薩犯於第二根本重罪。

src_original: punar aparam ādikarmiko bodhisatvaḥ kasyacid evaṃ vakṣyati /
tgt_original: 「復次善男子！ 初發心菩薩語餘人言：

src_original: kiṃ bhoḥ prātimokṣavinayena /  śīlena surakṣitena śīghraṃ tvam annuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādayasva /  mahāyānaṃ paṭha /  yat te kiñcit kāyavāṅmanobhiḥ kleśapratyayād akuśalaṃ karma samudānītaṃ tena pāṭhena śuddhir bhavaty avipākaṃ /
tgt_original: 『汝今何用受學波羅提木叉律儀？ 當速發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心，受持讀誦大乘經典，先所造作身口意業諸不善行當得清淨，不受未來諸惡果報。

src_original: yāvad yathāpūrvoktam ayam ādikarmikasya bodhisatvasya tṛtīyā mūlāpattiḥ //
tgt_original: 』餘如上說。 是名初發心菩薩犯於第三根本重罪。

src_original: punar aparaṃ kulaputra keṣāñcid ādikarmiko bodhisatva evaṃ vakṣyati /
tgt_original: 「復次善男子！ 初發心菩薩語餘人言：

src_original: varjayata yūyaṃ kulaputrāḥ śrāvakayānakathāṃ /  mā śṛṇuta mā paṭhata mā pareṣām upadiśata /  gopayata śrāvakayānakathāṃ /  na yūyaṃ tasmāt mahat phalaṃ prāpsyatha /  na yūyaṃ tato nidānāc chaktāḥ kleśāntaṃ kartuṃ /
tgt_original: 『汝今不應聽受讀誦聲聞經典，汝當覆蔽聲聞經典，聲聞法中無大果報，不能斷除結使煩惱。

src_original: śraddadhata mahāyānakathāṃ /  śṛṇuta mahāyānaṃ paṭhata mahāyānaṃ pareṣāṃ copadiśata /  tato yūyaṃ sarvadurgatyapāyapathān śamayiṣyatha /  kṣipraṃ cānnuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyatha //
tgt_original: 汝當聽受讀誦清淨大乘甚深經典，又能消除諸不善業，疾得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。

src_original: ubhayor api mūlāpatir bhavatīyam ādikarmikasya bodhisatvasya caturthī mūlāpattiḥ //
tgt_original: 是名初發心菩薩犯於第四根本重罪。

src_original: idaṃ ca mahāyānaṃ kīrtiśabdaślokārthaṃ lābhasatkārahetoḥ paṭhanti svādhyāyanti dhārayanti vācayanti deśayanti pareṣāṃ ca śrutamātram upadiśanti  evaṃ ca vakṣyanti /  vayaṃ mahāyānikā nānye /
tgt_original: 初發心菩薩欺妄兩舌，希求名稱利養恭敬，讚大乘經為他解說，而語人言： 『我是善解摩訶衍者。

src_original: te pareṣām īrṣyāyanti lābhasatkārahetor yatas te labhante upabhogaparibhogān parebhyas tatpratyayāt te prakupyanti teṣāṃ cāvarṇaṃ niścārayanti kutsanti paṃsayanti vijugupsanti /  ātmānaṃ cotkarṣayanti na tān /  atas te īrṣyahetunā cottarimanuṣyadharmair ātmānaṃ vijñapayanti /
tgt_original: 』為貪利故，見他解說大乘經典得供養者，憎毀輕疾而自貢高，虛誑妄語得過人法。

src_original: tatas te tena vastunā patitāḥ parājitā mahāyānasukhād etāṃ mahāgurukām āpattim āpadyante yayāpāyagāmino bhavanti /
tgt_original: 作此行者離安隱處犯波羅夷，於大乘中為犯最重根本罪也。 善男子！

src_original: yathā kaścit puruṣo ratnadvīpaṃ gacched gantuṃ nāvā samudram avatarate sa mahāsamudre svayam eva tāṃ nāvaṃ bhindyāt tatraiva maraṇaṃ nigacched
tgt_original: 譬如有人欲趣寶洲乘船入海，而於中路自壞其船，沒溺而死不自濟命，豈能得寶？

src_original: evam eva ye ādikarmikā bodhisatvā mahāguṇasāgaram avatartukāmā īrṣyāhetos tad vadanti /  tatpratyayāt te śraddhānāvaṃ bhittvā prajñājīvitena viyogaṃ prāpnuvanti /
tgt_original: 如初發心菩薩亦復如是，乘正信船入於大乘深廣法海，始得入海自壞信船失智慧命。

src_original: evaṃ te bālā ādikarmikā bodhisatvā īrṣyāhetor annṛtapratyayā mahāgurukām āpattim āpadyante /
tgt_original: 如是愚癡初發心菩薩，以嫉妬故虛誑妄語得過人法，而犯大乘重根本罪。 餘如上說。

src_original: iyaṃ pañcamī mūlāpattir ādikarmikasya bodhisatvasya //
tgt_original: 是名初發心菩薩犯於第五根本重罪。

src_original: punar aparaṃ kulaputra bhaviṣyanty annāgate 'dhvani gṛhasthapravrajitā ādikarmikā
tgt_original: 「復次善男子！ 未來世中初發心菩薩語在家出家初發心菩薩言：

src_original: bodhisatvā ye te gambhīrāḥ śūnyatāpratisaṃyuktāḥ sūtrāntādhāraṇīkṣāntisamādhibhūmisvalaṃkṛtamahāvidvatpuruṣāṇāṃ  kṛtaśramāṇāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ gocarās tān mahāyānasūtrāntān dhārayanti paṭhanti svādhyāyanti  pareṣāṃ ca vistareṇa vācayitvā prakāśayanti /
tgt_original: 『修多羅中甚深空義，及以三昧諸陀羅尼忍辱之地種種莊嚴，是大明智諸菩薩等所可觀行，受持讀誦大乘經典，又能為他分別演說。

src_original: ahaṃ cemān dharmān svabuddhyā buddhvaivaṃ ca punar ahaṃ kāruṇyahetos tavopadiśāmi /  tvayā vā punas tathā bhāvayitavyaṃ yathā tvam atra gambhīreṣu dharmeṣu pratyakṣo bhaviṣyasi /  evaṃ te jñānadarśanaṃ bhaviṣyati yathā mama /
tgt_original: 我自解了以慈悲故為汝等說，汝等亦當隨所說行，於深妙法而得知見。

src_original: etarhi na punar eva dadāti paṭhitamātreṇāham imān evaṃrūpān dharmān gambhīragambhīrān upadiśāmi na sākṣātkriyayā //  labhasatkārahetor ātmānaṃ vikrīṇāti /  tatpratyayāt sarvatryadhvagatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ bodhisatvānām āryapudgalānāṃ ca purataḥ sāparādhiko bhavati /  mahāgurukam āpattim āpadyate /  visaṃvādayati devamanuṣyān mahāyānena /
tgt_original: 』彼初發心菩薩不作是言我讀誦思惟從他聞解，而言自得，皆是貪求利養因緣而自衒賣，違負三世諸佛菩薩及眾賢聖，犯於大乘最深重罪，失人天路。

src_original: śrāvakayānam evāsya na bhavati /  prāg eva mahāyānasyāvatāraviśeṣādhigamaḥ /  prāg evānnuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ //
tgt_original: 尚不能得聲聞辟支佛乘，何由漸進到於大乘？ 善男子！

src_original: tad yathā kaścit puruṣo mahāṭavīṃ prasthitaḥ kṣuttarṣaprapīḍitaḥ sa tatra mahāphalavṛkṣe pratiṣṭhitaḥ /

src_original: āhārārthaṃ sa udāraphalavṛkṣam apahāya gandhasaṃpannaṃ rasasaṃpannam annāsvādya viṣavṛkṣam abhiruhya viṣaphalāni bhuñjīta bhuktvā ca kālaṃ kuryāt
tgt_original: 見彼林中有諸美果而棄捨之，取於毒果食已命終。

src_original: ye durlabhaṃ manuṣyalābhaṃ labdhvā kalyāṇamitraṃ sanniśritya mahāyānam avatartukāmā  lābhasatkārayaśohetor ātmānam upadarśayanti parān paṃsayanti evaṃrūpāṃ mahāgurukām
tgt_original: 彼初發心菩薩亦復如是，人身難得今已得之，遇善知識發大乘心，而貪利養輕自衒賣，犯重根本罪，違負三世諸佛菩薩，為諸賢聖之所棄捨，墮於惡趣。

src_original: āpattim āpadyante yayā gurukayāpattyā sarvavijñānāṃ paramajugupsitā bhavanti /  apāyagāminas tathārūpāś ca pudgalā na sevanīyāḥ sarvakṣatriyabrāhmaṇaviṭśūdrāṇāṃ /
tgt_original: 是故婆羅門、剎利、毘舍、首陀羅，不應親近此惡菩薩，若親近者亦皆得罪。

src_original: iyaṃ kulaputra bodhisatvasya ṣaṣṭhī mūlāpattiḥ //
